text: Hagi anante nagra Jeremaia'na amanage hu'na vahera zamasami'noe. Keho, ha'ma hurantesia ne'mo'a ko'ma runaku'ma nehia hampomo rehanintiri hiankna huno tagrama mani'nontega ne-e. Ana ne'mofo karisiramimo'za kagigagi zahokna hu'za neazage'za, hosi afu'aramimo'za tumpamo'ma tusi avunema anteno hareno vanoma nehiama'a agatere'za zamagare'za neaze. Anazama nege'na hazenkefi manunankita haviza hu'none hu'na hu'noe.
